name: THE WAY TO LOOK THE ROSE
name_original: THE WAY TO LOOK THE ROSE
description:
I recommend playing this game while listening to music.

If you let me know if there is a problem with what i'm using, I will delete it immediately.

Lonesome Journey' by Keys of Moon Music is under a Creative Commons license (CC BY 3.0)
Music promoted by BreakingCopyright: https://youtu.be/p5cWMxzzMdA

Did you watch the rose?

I think the rose(=flower) resemble life.

It's either too much attention or much indifference that makes the rose wither, live is the same.

I hope everyone to grow their own rose rather than others' rose.

I'm sure your rose will grow well. And that's enough.

Thank you for playing this game.

p.s I am not good in English. so if there is any mistake, please let me know.
